[Telescope Sniper]. Is one of the best choices for controller players when paired with targetting adjuster.
A very good secondary submachine gun.  Almost as good as pre nerf multimach was.

Craftable shotgun for a faster paced playsyle. Best on arc subclass.
The best secondary handcannon in the game.  Base stats (especially range) are amazing.

A very good choice for a primary shotgun.  Pair with an aggressive playstyle.
A very good choice for a secondary shotgun.  Pair with an aggressive playstyle.
Very good pulse rifle.  Perk Combo was the best currently available.
Best for grenade spam with a primary weapon.
A very good craftable fusion.  Crouch before shooting.

Great for Grenade Launcher Spam with a Primary.
A very Niche gun, shreds after kills.

A solid choice for a sidearm.  Harmony helps kill multiple enemies.
A very good Garden Weapon. Deadly 4 burst.

Amazing base stats for a 120. This gun dominates at mid range.

Great Craftable sidearm. Excels at dealing with multiple enemies.
One of a kind pulse rifle. Demolitionist for the extra grenade spam.
Great for a fast paced fusion loadout.
Amazing 120. Dominates with Explosive Rounds/Timed Payload flinch.

The best shotgun to pair with an arc subclass.
The best Craftable handcannon. Its perk combination is unmatched.
The best Craftable sniper. Its perk combination is unmatched.

Great primary sniper for fast playstyles.
The Long Range secondary SMG GOAT.
